contentList.content:
The book is brimming with arcane energy.
Using it will summon Odinblade's Illusion, where you can configure settings for Odinblade mods.

Don't forget to support modders for any games and mods that you play. We put a lot of effort into creating content, and a little support goes a long way!

If you wish to tip me, head to ko-fi.com/odinblade. Thank you!
Why are you speaking through an illusion?
I'm cooking up some more mods and enhancements in my study, so it wouldn't exactly be efficient to travel wherever you call me to now, would it?
Ah there we go I can see you now. I really ought to invest in better arcane bandwidth...
[OFF] I do not want enemy Summons to utilise the Boon effects.
[ON] I would like enemies to be able to use Odinblade skills.
[ON] I would like Odinblade Overhaul vendors to be present in the world.
I don't want to make changes at this time.
I don't know. What do you call a successful mirage?
I want to change my Enhanced Summon Scaling settings.
[ON] I would like enemy Summons to utilise the Boon effects.
Excellent! Then I shall continue creating more content for you to enjoy.

Current status: [OdinCORE_CustomVendors_Value_5df00af8-4e59-4a8c-82a8-094aba487ad2]
Vendors are included with Odinblade's Overhaul mods, as well as having their weapons and skills available to vanilla vendors. Would you like the new Overhaul vendors to be ON or OFF?
[OFF] I would not like Odinblade Overhaul vendors to be present in the world.

Current status: [OdinCORE_EnemySkills_Value_51846049-ce6a-40ba-8ede-816cd3457fe0]
Enemies can use Odinblade skills and effects should you wish. Would you like this feature to be ON or OFF?

Current status: [OdinCORE_BSS_Value_3f4cfb42-3e70-4105-a7f2-52e3eea0576a]
Enemies can utilise the Boons added in my Enhanced Summon Scaling mod on their own Summons. Would you like this feature to be ON or OFF?
I want to change my Custom Vendor settings.
[OFF] I would not like enemies to be able to use Odinblade skills.
What do you call a successful mirage?
I don't want to make changes at this time.
I don't want to make changes at this time.
My, you are a curious one aren't you?
I want to change my Enemy Skills settings.
Can I help you with anything?
Character is a conduit for electrical skills.
Character will become Knocked Down if their footing is lost again.
Character will take damage from <font color='#65C900'>poison</font> attacks, surfaces, and statuses.
Character is currently affected by debilitating <font color='#65C900'>spores</font>.
Character will take damage each time they cast a skill.

Each time you <font color='#B823CB'>sacrifice Vitality</font> for a <font color='#D7001F'>Bloodtide</font> spell, you restore <font color="#a8a8a8">Physical Armour</font> equal to the sacrifice percentage.

Each time you <font color='#B823CB'>sacrifice Vitality</font> for a <font color='#D7001F'>Bloodtide</font> spell, you restore <font color="#a8a8a8">Physical Armour</font> equal to the sacrifice percentage.

Nearby <font color='#88a25b'>allied</font> characters without <font color='#a8a8a8'>Physical Armour</font> within 5m become <font color="#c9aa58">Diseased</font>, getting the same debuffs as <font color="#c9aa58">Infected</font>.
Character has been embued with power.

Character has +3 Summon Count.
This status dissipates upon conjuring a Non-Undead Summon.

Character has +3 Summon Count.
This status dissipates upon conjuring a Non-Undead Summon.
The next time you kill a <font color='#88a25b'>non-allied</font> character, raise a <font color='#7F25D4'>Totemic Zombie</font>.
Character is immune to the <font color='#C7A758'>Terrified</font> and <font color='#C7A758'>Transfixed</font> statuses.
Mastery of flames at a cost of water weakness.
Upon death the character will explode, dealing devastating fire damage to nearby enemies.
Unable to move or dodge. Can not be targeted by teleportation skills.

A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.
Enemies within 6m are also cursed.
A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.

A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.
Enemies within 6m are also cursed.
A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.

A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.
Enemies within 6m are also cursed.
A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.
Mild afflication to bestow torment; a worthy sacrifice.

You may have a maximum of one pact at a time.
Range: +4m
You may have a maximum of one pact at a time.

You may have a maximum of one pact at a time.
Vitality cannot fall below 1HP
The end is nigh; this is just the beginning...
Upon removal or expiry, the character will explode, dealing massive <font color="#c80030">piercing damage</font> and applying <font color="#67ffdd">Agony</font> to nearby targets.
It's so easy to exploit stupidity...
Ice forms a protective barrier around you.

Allows you to apply <font color="#cfecff">Hypothermia</font> regardless of whether your targets are <font color="#cfecff">Chilled</font>, <font color="#cfecff">Frozen</font>, or have <font color="#188ede">Magic Armour</font>.
You are rooted in place and cannot move.
|Character suffers consequences of loosing a Challenge.|
|Character was victorious in a recent Challenge.|
"The Umbra will restore Order to the world..."
"The Umbra will restore Order to the world..."
"The Umbra will restore Order to the world..."
"Why make a big display when you can just kill your target instead?"
"The Umbra will plunge the world into Chaos..."
"The Umbra will plunge the world into Chaos..."
"The Umbra will plunge the world into Chaos..."
|Character suffers consequences of loosing a Challenge.|
|Character was victorious in a recent Challenge.|
"Why make a big display when you can just kill your target instead?"
"We have mastered aiming for the weak-spot..."

Deals [1] damage at the start of each turn.

Removed by Wet, Chilled, Frozen, and Hypothermia.

Deals [1] damage on apply and at the start of each turn.

Removed by Wet, Chilled, Frozen, and Hypothermia.

Deals [1] damage on apply and at the start of each turn.
Deals [1] damage on apply and at the start of each turn.

Deals [1] damage per turn.

Removed by Warm, Burning, Necrofire, and Scorch.
Devours fire surfaces to restore Vitality.
Character is paralysed with fear and is unable to perform actions.
A shroud of ice freezes them in places and renders them invulnerable to damage.
Character is invisible until the end of the turn.
Can't attack, cast or interact with objects.
Can't attack, cast or interact with objects.
Can't attack, cast or interact with objects.
Hitting enemies with melee hits will cause shocking volts to be striken off at nearby enemies. Volts can fork up to 2 times.
Hitting enemies with melee hits will cause shocking volts to be striken off at nearby enemies.
